string-array.name: Task
string-array.item: Run around the room imitating a gorilla or a monkey if not then drink.
Using a random object, demonstrate how to give a BLOWJOB or finish your drink.
Pick another player.Together, find a stranger and each of you tell the stranger a joke. Let them be the judge on whose joke was funnier. The loser drinks twice.
Dance hula hooping for 30 seconds or drink.
Pour water on your pants so it looks like you pissed yourself. Let the group post it on Instagram with a сaption of their choosing. Do this, take two shots, or quit playing.
Kiss the player of your choice on the forehead,then sniff it or drink four times.
Drink if youve ever written without your hands.
The title of the film "Titanic" shows without words. The first one to guess decides who gets four sips. If no one gets it right, you drink.
You tell the most shameful story or you drink twice.
Eat whatever other players make or drink.
Eat something very spicy or drink.
Sing PIKOTARO - PPAP or drink.
Dance striptease to Isyan Tetick - Patlamaya Devam or drink.
Swap some clothes with a player of your choice or drink.
Make a group chat with all the people youve ever had sex with saying: "Hoping all my sexual partners could connect :3" finish your drink, or quit playing.
Pick someone whos not a player and dance a romantic dance with them or drink.
Wear socks for three rounds or drink.
Wear your pants backwards for three rounds or drink.
Let the player across the room make-up or drink.
Playing scissors rock paper with the player across from who lost and drinks.
Break an egg on your head or drink.
Eat something without using your hands or drink.
Make a shirt / skirt out of a garbage bag and wear it for the next two rounds or drink.
Eat a spoon of mustard or drink.
Break up with your girlfriend / boyfriend or drink (ratio more expensive).
Do a belly dance, take a video and upload it to Instagram or drink.
Call your parents and tell them theyre grounded for a week or drink.
Put the ice in your shirt or your underwear until it melts or you drink.
Try licking your elbow while you sing a song or drink.
Call your ex and try to get back in the XD relationship better drink.
Massage someone here or drink.
Put your bad photo on social media. Let other people choose it or drink it.
Say «MonkeySlut» at the end of each of your and others lines, until your turn or drink.
Open up any social media outlet, log on to the first person you see, and type on every post or drink.
Close your eyes and let the other participants put in your mouth any food from the fridge they choose ,or drink.
Let each player choose one word, and then you write them and publish them on social media or drink them twice.
Give your phone to the person in front of you and have him post whatever he wants on your social media accounts or drink.
Call your friend/girlfriend and tell them youre gay/lesbian or drink.
Call and tell your friend/girlfriend or drink.>
Dial a random number and try to sell the vibrator or drink. If no one answers, the task is not counted.
Sit in the closet or under the table until its your turn again or drink.
Tap-dance while everyones filming or drinking.
Draw a moustache on your face with whatever you want. Dont erase it for the rest of the game or drink it.
Show your favorite sex pose without photos or videos or drink.
Show a porn actor/actress without a word the one who guesses who chooses whom to drink, if no one guesses then drink.
Take off your top clothes and pretend youre a bodybuilder Pose like a bodybuilder. Do 10 poses or drink.
Stand in a cancer pose on the ground and shake your ass on video or drink.
Players set you up on social media at their discretion or drink twice.
Fill your mouth with food and try whistling or drinking.
Make clothes out of toilet paper and upload photos to social media or drink.
You call someone you like and tell them you love them or drink them.
Smell the armpits on the right of the sitting player or drink.
Theyll tie your eyes and put you in front of the fridge with a finger and eat or drink.
Ask the neighbors for toilet paper or drink.
Bite an onion like an apple if you dont have onions.
Blindfolded, you can guess who hit you in the ass and continue until you know. Or you can just drink.
Each of the players draws a tattoo of your body or drinks.
They draw you a unibrow, take a picture and throw it on the social network or drink.
You masage any players feet or you drink.
Youre gonna miss every players kiss if they say yes, then kiss them if they say no, then drink.
You give a love bite vacuum a blow, you take a picture, and you throw it on the social media, and the players come up with a signature or a drink.
Make a love bite on your arm or drink.
You get a hickey on your cheek or you drink.
Show your blow job on a banana or drink.
Throw money to charity or drink.
Spray perfume or deodorant in your mouth or drink.
You sing a song that the players wish on or drink to you.
You say the main downside to each player or you drink.
Lick the soap or drink.
